reviews.review: Неплохая игра скажу я вам.Моя грива всегда привстает когда вижу KoN4a_v_KedAh или MasHu_PeZDuPOmaJu.Неплохой classic так сказать.Каждый найдёт себя а песочном замке оргий или в  снежном как мой член человеке(я про дуст или оффис).Только вот хуй его знает что делать с этим гостевым пропуском,говорят что активация на определённое  время,хуёво.
2004年的杰作，现在2021年了，玩的人依然有。有的服务器是常规玩法，有的是自创的地图和玩法，就像创意工坊一样。喜欢《反恐精英》系列游戏的我怎么能在打折的时候不给G胖送钱支持一下呢？
it's a good game , but i only own it becuse  i need it for  gmod

Counter Strike:Source,yaniiii... Nostalji ;) Counter Strike ilk sürümünden daha çok severim,görüntüsü olsun karakterler silahlar.Herşey daha güzel ve gerçekçi şahsen.Ve en güzeli/kötüsü ise,Garry's Mod'da bu oyun olmadan çoğu şey hata olarak görünüyor.Herneyse genel olarak tartıcak olursam oyunu.... 10/10 kesinlikle öneririm. Tek eksiği oyuncusu ama genede vaktine göre oldukca dolu sunucuları var. CS:GO kanser kitlesinden sıkıldıysanız öneririm. He rus burda da boldur biraz onuda uyarayım.

good textures and models. need it for gmod maps.

Somehow this game is still fun to play in 2021! But you shouldn't spend money on it when you can rather get CS:GO for free.

I purchased it in 2020 and started playing it this year. Didn't really expect much of the game, just thought it would be a downgraded version of CS:GO. It was exactly that, but it is fun. I got my little sister to play this game instead of CS:GO because it is easier, she loves it.

The game's mechanics is pretty much the same as CS:GO. There is movement mechanics, spray-patterns...the usual counter strike things. Just not exactly the same as CS:GO. No need to dive deeper.

As expected, this is an old game, so it will run well on any PC. Not too sure about that stable 60fps on a weak PC, but you will definitely have playable fps above 30 or even 50.

If you want to explore the older counter strike games and compare them then sure, give this game a try if you are willing to spend money on it. I think picking up CS:GO is a better option though.

Very good and important game. This game is important if you are playing Garry’s mod custom maps because there is usually a chance if you don’t have Counter-Strike: Source installed you’ll have some missing textures. It’s also a fun game to play with your friends. 9/10, recommend.
